Events that occurred on 6 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1877 - Actor Robert Farquharson is born.
1924 - Translator William Auld is born.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to R.W. Burchfield.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 194.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 194a.
1957 - Actor Cam Clarke is born.
1969 - Informal date of foundation of The Tolkien Society.
1980 - Inkling Nevill Coghill dies.
1992 - Actor Robert Aramayo is born.
2000 - Author L. Sprague de Camp dies.
2001 - "The Fellowship of the Ring", the first set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, is released.
2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Making of the Movie Trilogy is published.
2004 - Hyarion purchases the domain TolkienGateway.net.
2006 - Peter Jackson: A Film-maker's Journey is published.
2007 - Essential Tolkien audiobook is released.
2009 - The Facebook application The One Ring is launched.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
